statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -1 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ -3 \\ -8 \\ 28 \\ 15 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -33 \\ 6 \\ 22 \\ -86 \\ -48 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ -4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -2 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
